full_threads.body:
Andy QA and management time.

(Time: 30mins)
Perfect! All fixed now

Thanks for flagging that!

That “Home V2” reference was likely just a caching issue. We’ve gone ahead and cleared it on our end and refreshed things, so you should see the correct title now.

Let me know if it’s still showing up for you or if anything else comes up!
Thanks - can we get rid of this "home V2" reference showing in the tab:

Hi,

All live now! 🚀

Glad I could help. Let me know if anything else comes up.

Hi Glenn - thanks, lets push this live.

Appreciate all your help

Liz
additional (Time:5mins)

Hi Liz,

All done! I’ve applied the updates you outlined, thanks for the clear summary.

Here’s the staging link for review: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/home-revamp

Let me know if anything needs adjusting, but I think we’re nearly there!

Hi Glen, Hi all

Just a few tweaks to make summarised below. Reach out with any questions - if you can apply these updates then send me a staging link I will check and then I think we will be good to go. Thanks!


  1. Remove "Backed by Lloyds" and increase the font size of "Built for brokers"





  1. Replace the copy on the "underwriting that understands" card with:



We know and understand your clients risks because we've been underwriting them for years. Every slip is reviewed, and you will receive a clear, accurate decision (we'll never give you the runaround!)




  1. Replace the copy on the "Service that puts brokers first" card with: .



"Every quote is handled by an experienced underwriter who's here to help you. Fast, consistent, and easy to deal with"




  1. This is separate to the refresh stuff, but pls can you remove the word "independence" from the "our values" card:






  1. And one last thing, can we add a tile for our Insta in the footer (Ocean Underwriting (@oceanunderwriting) • Instagram photos and videos)
(Time:10mins)

Hi Liz,

All sorted on our end—thanks again for sending through the revised copy!

You can review everything here: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/home-revamp

Feel free to take a look and let us know if there’s anything that needs tweaking before we push it live.

Always happy to help!

Hi Liz,

Thanks for sending this through! We’ll go ahead and apply the revised copy to the site.

We’ll share a preview link with you before it goes live so you can give it a once-over—just to make sure everything looks right.

Appreciate your help on this!

Hey all

Pls see attached revised copy. Happy for you to apply this to the website and if you can send me the link ahead of going live just so I can review and make sure I've not missed anything that'd be awesome!

Thanks for all your help

Liz

Hi Elizabeth,

Here’s a quick summary of the copy updates we applied to the homepage:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NwC6DfUXZeATgTqc_icYEmfxitI6nFefUkWydhgNDrs/edit?usp=sharing
Thanks Glen - I should have taken some screen shots of the website - can you send me a summary of the copy/updates you applied so I can go through it and amend?

Hi Elizabeth,

No problem at all. We’ve paused things for now and will wait for your updated copy and approval before moving forward.

Just send it over when you’re ready, and we’ll take it from there!

Hi Glenn

Thank you for the update. Are we able to pause this going live as there is some content on here that isn't on brand for us or Lloyds, and I need to make some changes to copy etc.

Thank you
(Time:150mins)

Hi Elizabeth,

Just a quick update. We’ve wrapped up the latest round of site improvements! Here’s what’s been done:

  • Refreshed the design to highlight our key differentiators
  • Enhanced the mobile layout and CTAs for a smoother, more usable experience on smaller screens
  • Promoted the Product Book as the primary call-to-action to better capture new leads
  • Moved the Lloyd’s logo to the top of the homepage for immediate trust and credibility

You can check out the updated page here: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/home-revamp/

All sorted on our end. Feel free to take a look and let me know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.

Hi Elizabeth,

Just a quick update—we’ve wrapped up the latest round of site improvements! Here’s what’s been done:

  • Refreshed the design to highlight our key differentiators
  • Enhanced the mobile layout and CTAs for a smoother, more usable experience on smaller screens
  • Promoted the Product Book as the primary call-to-action to better capture new leads
  • Moved the Lloyd’s of London logo to the top of the homepage for immediate trust and credibility

You can check out the updated site here: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/home-revamp/

All sorted on our end—feel free to take a look and let me know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.
